enterButton.description: If there is a confirmation button, you can set it as button text. This property will conflict with 'addonAfter'.
enterButton.description_zh: 是否有确认按钮，可设为按钮文字。该属性会与 `addonAfter` 冲突。

addonAfter.description: Input with labels, set the post-labels
addonAfter.description_zh: 带标签的 input，设置后置标签

addonBefore.description: Input with a label to set the pre-label
addonBefore.description_zh: 带标签的 input，设置前置标签

allowClear.description: You can click the clear icon to delete the content
allowClear.description_zh: 可以点击清除图标删除内容

bordered.description: Whether there is a border or not

disabled.description: Whether the status is disabled or not, the default is false
disabled.description_zh: 是否禁用状态，默认为 false

id.description: Enter the ID of the field

showCount.description: Whether or not to display the number of words
showCount.type: boolean | { formatter: (info: { value: string, count: number, maxLength?: number }) => ReactNode }

size.description: Control size. Note: The size limit of the input box in the standard form is middle
size.description_zh: 控件大小。注：标准表单内的输入框大小限制为 middle

type.description: Declare the input type, which is the same as the type attribute of the native input tag
type.description_zh: 声明 input 类型，同原生 input 标签的 type 属性

value.description: Enter the contents of the box

events.name: onSearch
events.description: Click the search icon, the clear icon, or the callback when you press enter
events.description_zh: 点击搜索图标、清除图标，或按下回车键时的回调
